title: The new Elden Ring DLC: What we know so far. #eldenring #dlc #shadowoftheerdtree #ignfanfest
Manor Lords - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
description:
Watch this Manor Lords gameplay overview trailer for the upcoming medieval strategy game. Rule your lands as a medieval lord, engage in real-time tactical battles, manage detailed city building, and more.

Manor Lords will release in Early Access for PC on April 26, 2024 on Steam and GOG, and will also be available day one on PC Game Pass.

This Manor Lords gameplay trailer was originally revealed in 2020.

#ManorLords #Gaming #IGN

title: Silent Breath - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
description:
A forest full of terror awaits in this creepy gameplay trailer for Silent Breath, an upcoming horror game powered by Unreal Engine 5. Silent Breath features microphone detection mechanics, dynamic scares, and more. Silent Breath is coming soon to Early Access on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store). If you're interested, you can learn more about the game on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2796180/SILENT_BREATH/

In Silent Breath, unpredictable horrors lurk around every corner, forcing you to find the missing people while desperately clinging to survival. In this experience, even your own mind can become your enemy. Stay vigilant and keep your voice hushed, or risk becoming another victim of the forest's darkness.

title: Hi-Fi RUSH - Official PS5 Announce Trailer
description:
Chai and the gang are on the road and about to rock out a whole new venue: Charge your DualSense controller and crank up the volume, because Hi-Fi RUSH is coming to PlayStation 5 on March 19!

#IGN

title: Sea of Thieves - Official PS5 Announcement
description:
Ready to meet plenty more pirates on the seas? New crews will soon arrive seeking fortune and adventure.

Sea of Thieves sets sail on PlayStation 5 on April 30th, opening our seas to more pirates than ever before!

#IGN #Gaming #PS5

title: The Bad Batch Season 3 Review: Episodes 1-8
description:
We’ve got your Star Wars: The Bad Batch review fresh from watching half of The Bad Batch season 3. Review what we had to say in either video or text here for a spoiler-free analysis for what is The Bad Batch finale season. This Star Wars review is only concerning episodes 1-8, and won’t cover the ultimate fate of The Bad Batch yet for Star Wars: The Bad Batch. In the Bad Batch trailer, you may have spotted a few ideas that may come true.

In Star Wars: The Bad Batch season 3, another era comes to a close in the Star Wars Galaxy, and yet several new story threads are moving into place for the Bad Batch, season 3 being their final outing presumably. What’s ahead for Omega? And could Star Wars: The Bad Batch have a The Clone Wars conclusion of sorts? In the Bad Batch S3 promors and The Bad Batch trailer, 2 or more options already seem likely for the clones’ story ending for the members of The Bad Batch. Tech dies for a reason, lets hope, after all the struggles that must be endu

title: The Latest Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase Reveals - NVC 699
description:
Join the NVC crew as we talk about some of the best (and just okay) game reveals at Nintendo's February 2024 Partner Showcase. With everything from awesome Xbox Studios games like Pentiment making its way to Switch along with Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance and 3DS classics like Monster Hunter Stories getting ported over, there's tons here to talk about! Which are you looking forward to the most?

Make sure to tune into IGN’s Fan Fest beginning February 19th for exclusive interviews, trailers, gameplay and more from the biggest names in games and entertainment. Including Dune Part 2 and Netflix’s Avatar The Last Airbender, to Anime such as Oshi no Ko and Solo Leveling, to game exclusives from WWE 2K24 and Street Fighter 6, along with reveals from Marvel Comics, Spawn Rat City, and more! We’ll also be streaming live on all of IGN’s platforms for the main event on February 23rd and 24th, with even more reveals and surprises from fan-favorite shows, movies, comics, and games.

#

title: Why The Bad Batch Season 3 Is Not The End For Omega or The Clones
description:
The Batch aka Clone Force 99 returns in Star Wars: The Bad Batch for their final season! Check out The Bad Batch trailer, which shows the last adventures that we’ll see in Star Wars: The Bad Batch Season 3.

Other Star Wars shows don’t feature the Bad Batch characters, so is it safe to assume they’re all doomed? In the Bad Batch season 3, Omega has a journey of self she must do before Star Wars: The Bad Batch has its series finale. Meanwhile, the remnants of The Clone Wars will face their fate…whatever it might be. Remember, while The Bad Batch S3 is the last of this series, it’s not impossible for the clones to live on! Though little is given away in any media including The Bad Batch trailer, 2 fates are ultimately likely for the Bad Batch.

Was the scene where Tech dies seemingly, a forever thing? Is there more for the clones post Order 66? Kim Horcher interviewed the cast and crew and has clues for what may be the fates for Hunter, Tech, Wrecker, Omega, and maybe even Vent

title: Manor Lords - Official Battle Features Trailer
description:
Watch this Manor Lords battle features trailer, highlighting its formations, melee stances, archery modes, weather, and more. Get a look at some of the detailed systems coming to the upcoming medieval strategy game later this year. 

The Manor Lords Early Access release date is April 26, 2024 on PC via Steam and GOG. It will also be available day one on PC Game Pass.

This Manor Lords trailer was originally revealed in 2021.

#ManorLords #Gaming #IGN

title: How to easily take down automatons in #helldivers2
15 Hidden Details in the Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree Trailer
description: FromSoftware released the first trailer for Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree DLC and we've got several theories on how the story will play out based on some hidden details we found.

title: Level Zero: Extraction - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
description:
Get another look at Level Zero: Extraction to see gameplay and horrifying creatures in this latest trailer for the multiplayer extraction horror with high-stakes asymmetric PvPvPvE and immersive FPS combat. In level Zero: Extraction, embark on dangerous scavenging expeditions—solo or with a team. Or play as an alien monster that can only be killed with light and make sure no mortal escapes alive. 

A closed beta for Level Zero: Extraction begins on March 15, 2024, and sign-ups are available on the game's Steam page.

title: Contra: Operations Galuga - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Here's your look at gameplay, formidable bosses, weapons, perks, the story mode, and 4-player arcade mode in this latest trailer for Contra: Operation Galuga, an upcoming reimagining of the classic run 'n' gun NES/arcade game from the 1980s. Contra: Operation Galuga features timeless gameplay, iconic weapons, modern graphics and sound, new stages, new enemies and bosses, new play mechanics, and co-op combat for up to two players in Story Mode. Contra: Operation Galuga will be available on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch on March 12, 2024. A demo for Contra: Operation Galuga is available now.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest

title: The Forever Winter - Official Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Watch the tense trailer for The Forever Winter, an upcoming tactical survival-horror shooter game where squads must fight to survive under the shadow of terrifying and gargantuan war machines. The Forever Winter is coming soon to Steam.

#IGNFanFest

title: Dome-King Cabbage - Official Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Dive into the surreal new trailer for Dome-King Cabbage, an upcoming psychedelic visual novel set in the world of a monster-collecting RPG. The latest trailer for Dome-King Cabbage from developer Cobysoft Co. and publisher Hyper Real showcases quirky characters and a gorgeous, curious world. Dome-King Cabbage is coming soon to PC and Nintendo Switch.

Dome-King Cabbage follows a cloud-person named Mush nervously making their way to a job interview. Mush has to grapple with their ability to perceive the world through the lens of a monster-collecting RPG.

#IGNFanFest

title: Incolatus - Official Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Incolatus is a first-person arena-style shooter running on the Unreal 5 game engine which incorporates advanced movement mechanics in a sci-fi fantasy setting. Wishlist Incolatus on Steam now.

#IGNFanFest

title: Wild Bastards - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
The spiritual successor to the epic strategy-shooter Void Bastards, Wild Bastards is a hybrid FPS/strategy game with heart-pounding tactical combat, detailed management systems, and a roguelike campaign. Saddle up and lead the most notorious outlaws in the galaxy. Wishlist Wild Bastards now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest

title: IGN Fan Fest Day 2 - Dune: Part 2, The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live, WWE 2K24, & More!
description:
IGN's Fan Fest continues with day 2 of our live coverage. We've got the cast of AMC's The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live here to talk to us about Rick a Michonne's journey after the main series has ended. We're also sitting down with the cast of the upcoming Dune Part Two movie to share their insights on what to expect in this epic sequel. If you're a fan of Wrestling, stick around as you'll be getting an exclusive gameplay look at WWE 2K24. Not to mention, loads of anime reveals including One Piece and Solo Leveling. Day 2 kicks off Saturday (2/24) at 10am (PT) with more surprises, exclusives, and more!

Dune: Part 2
The Walking Dead: The Ones Who Live
WWE 2K24
One Piece
Solo Leveling
Abbott Elementary
And much more!

Game Code Giveaway Terms and Conditions: 
https://www.ign.com/wikis/ign/IGN_Fan_Fest_2024_Giveaway

title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Watch this gameplay trailer for Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn, an action-RPG open-world adventure available summer 2024 on Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5, and PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest

title: Turbo Kid - Official Release Date Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Hop on your trusty BMX and get ready to survive the dangerous wasteland in this release date trailer for Turbo Kid, an upcoming Metroidvania game based on the movie. The latest trailer for Turbo Kid showcases various locations you'll explore, bloody combat action, and more! Turbo Kid will be available on April 10, 2024, and a new demo comes to Steam on February 23, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest

title: Llamasoft The Jeff Minter Story - Official Release Date Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
42 of the weirdest, trippiest, sheepiest games ever created. Enter the mind of Jeff Minter, the legendary creator of Attack of the Mutant Camels, Gridrunner, and Tempest 2000, in this interactive documentary from Digital Eclipse. Get another look at Llamasoft: The Jeff Minter Story in this new trailer.

Llamasoft: The Jeff Minter Story is an interactive deep dive into the life and career of designer and programmer Jeff Minter, who founded Llamasoft and led development on games like Polybius and Gridrunner. Llamasoft: The Jeff Minter Story will be available on Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC (via Steam and GOG) on March 13, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest

title: Rocket Knight Adventures: Re-Sparked Collection - Official Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Here's your look at gameplay and some of the features you can expect from the Rocket Knight Adventures: Re-Sparked Collection. The trailer showcases the new boss rush mode, the all-new boost mode, and more. Rocket Knight Adventures: Re-Sparked Collection features three titles in one game. Follow the journey of Sparkster to defend the kingdom from an army of pigs. Rocket Knight Adventures: Re-Sparked Collection is coming to Nintendo Switch, PS5, and PS4.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest

title: Ninja Five-O - Official Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Ninja Five-O is an action game centered around Joe Osugi, a ninja tasked with stopping a terrorist group influenced by the Mad Masks, masks that give the wearer obscene power. As Osugi, the player must defeat the terrorists and rescue hostages through five missions with three levels and a boss battle. Check out the trailer for Ninja Five-O to see action-packed gameplay and dangerous enemies! Konami's Ninja Five-O is coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, and PlayStation 4.

#IGNFanFest

title: Felix the Cat Collection - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Take a look at platforming gameplay across various locations in this trailer for Konami's Felix the Cat collection. Join Felix on his worldwide search as flies a monoplane across mountains, delves into the ocean depths in a submarine and races across bizarre landscapes in a wild and whacky one-wheeled car! All provided by the Magic Bag of Tricks! The Felix the Cat collection is coming to PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest

title: Wild Bastards - Official Gameplay Overview | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
The spiritual successor to the epic strategy-shooter Void Bastards, Wild Bastards is a hybrid FPS/strategy game with heart-pounding tactical combat, detailed management systems, and a roguelike campaign. Saddle up and lead the most notorious outlaws in the galaxy. Wishlist Wild Bastards now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest

title: Harold Halibut - Official Overview Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Get a deep dive and behind-the-scenes look at Harold Halibut in this latest trailer for the upcoming handmade narrative adventure game. The trailer gives insight into the game's story, a mysterious group called The Lightkeepers, a gorgeous realm, gameplay, and how the game was created via handcrafted art like clay figures and 3D scanning. Harold Halibut is coming to PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X/S, and a demo is available now on Steam.

Harold Halibut is a handmade narrative game about friendship and life on a city-sized spaceship submerged in an alien ocean. It's been 250 years since your home - an ark-like spaceship - fled an Earth on the verge of cold war to find a habitable planet to preserve the human race.

#IGNFanFest

title: The Plucky Squire - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Get a fresh look at the charming world of The Plucky Squire in this latest trailer for the upcoming action-adventure game from developer All Possible Futures and publisher Devolver Digital. Join Jot and pals on an adventure as this new trailer showcases puzzle-solving elements through the clever use of jumping between the game's 2D and 3D worlds, flipping pages of a storybook to unlock clues, and fighting off enemies to continue a quest! The Plucky Squire will be available on Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (via Steam) in 2024.

#IGNFanFest

title: Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 - Official Gameheads Partnership Trailer
description:
Watch the video for Marvel's Spider-Man 2 to see the reveal that Insomniac Games, SIE, and Marvel Games have partnered with Gameheads, an organization that supports underrepresented students in tech, to bring two new suits to Marvel’s Spider-Man 2. Check it out to see what to expect with the Fly N' Fresh suit pack, which includes the fly suit for Peter, the fresh suit for Miles, 10 photo mode stickers, and 2 photo mode frames.

#SpiderMan #Gaming #IGN

title: Borderlands Movie: Exclusive Trailer Breakdown with Randy Pitchford  | IGN Fan Fest 2024
The Spiderwick Chronicles - Official Teaser Trailer (2024) Joy Bryant | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
The Spiderwick Chronicles follows the coming-of-age story of the Grace Family, as they move from New York to Michigan and into their family’s ancestral home.  Upon arrival, the family not only uncovers mysteries hidden inside their great grandfather’s Spiderwick Estate, but also discovers a secret, fantastical world around them.  

An ensemble cast of actors bring the series’ beloved characters to life including Joy Bryant as “Helen Grace"; Noah Cottrell as “Simon Grace"; Lyon Daniels as “Jared Grace”; Mychala Lee as “Mallory Grace”; Jack Dylan Grazer as the voice of “Thimbletack” and Christian Slater as “Mulgarath.” 

The Spiderwick Chronicles is coming to The Roku Channel on April 19, 2024.

#IGN #IGNFanFest

title: Level Zero: Extraction Combines Escape From Tarkov With Alien: Isolation
description:
Level Zero has returned as Level Zero: Extraction. It's still a sort of multiplayer Alien: Isolation, but now it's mixed in Tarkov-like extraction elements too, hence the name change. We were quite impressed with our hands-on time with this 11-player, 9v2 PvP game. Written by Henry Stockdale.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Dune: Part 2 Review
description:
Don't miss our Dune 2 review! 

Dune: Part 2, reviewed by Tom Jorgensen

Dune: Part Two expands the legend of Paul Atreides in spectacular fashion, and the war for Arrakis is an arresting, mystical ride at nearly every turn. Denis Villeneuve fully trusts his audience to buy into Dune’s increasingly dense mythology, constructing Part Two as an assault on the senses that succeeds in turning a sprawling saga into an easily digestible, dazzling epic. Though the deep world-building sometimes comes at the cost of fleshing out newer characters, the totality of Dune: Part Two’s transportive power is undeniable.

#Dune #Movies #IGN

title: Borderlands - Official Trailer (2024) Cate Blanchett, Kevin Hart, Jack Black | IGN Fan Fest 2024
description:
Directed by Eli Roth, Borderlands is based on the video games created by Gearbox Software and published by 2K. The film stars Cate Blanchett, Kevin Hart, Jack Black, Edgar Ramírez, Ariana Greenblatt, Florian Munteanu, Gina Gershon, and Jamie Lee Curtis. 

Lilith (Blanchett), an infamous treasure hunter with a mysterious past, reluctantly returns to her home planet of Pandora to find the missing daughter of Atlas (Ramírez), the universe’s most powerful S.O.B. She forms an unexpected alliance with a ragtag team of misfits – Roland (Hart), once a highly respected soldier, but now desperate for redemption; Tiny Tina (Greenblatt), a feral pre-teen demolitionist; Krieg (Munteanu), Tina’s musclebound, rhetorically challenged protector; Tannis (Curtis), the scientist who’s seen it all; and Claptrap (Black), a persistently wiseass robot. 

These unlikely heroes must battle alien monsters and dangerous bandits to find and protect the missing girl, who may hold the key to unimaginable p

title: Helldivers 2 - 5 Tips for Easily Defeating Automatons
description:
As Super Earth's greatest heroes fight to spread Liberty to the far reaches of Space in Helldivers 2, it has become clear that those vicious, freedom-hating robots known as Automatons are a particularly tough challenge. We’ve put together these 5 crucial tips to help you turn those bots to scrap in the name of managed democracy.

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:20 - 1. Stay Mobile
01:04 - 2. Best Weapons Against Automatons
01:54 - 3. Position Yourselves Strategically (Weak Points)
02:57 - 4. Best Strategems Against Automatons
04:21 - 5. Watch for Sentry Turret Friendly Fire

For more guides, walkthroughs, loadout tips and more, head to our growing Helldivers 2 wiki!
https://www.ign.com/wikis/helldivers-2

title: Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer (4K)
description:
Watch the Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree gameplay trailer. Here’s your first look at the upcoming Elden Ring DLC.

In the Land of Shadow, Miquella awaits the return of his promised Lord. Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree is the upcoming DLC for the action-RPG. Check out three minutes of Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree DLC gameplay featuring intense boss battles and more. The Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree release date is June 21, 2024 on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, PS4 (PlayStation 4), and Xbox One.

#EldenRing #Gaming #IGN

title: Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree - Gameplay Reveal Trailer
description:
Watch the Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree gameplay trailer. Here’s your first look at the upcoming Elden Ring DLC.

In the Land of Shadow, Miquella awaits the return of his promised Lord. Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree is the upcoming DLC for the action-RPG. Check out three minutes of Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree DLC gameplay featuring intense boss battles and more. title: World of Goo 2 - Nintendo Switch Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
description:
Get ready to get sticky when World of Goo 2 arrives as a console exclusive to Nintendo Switch on May 23rd, 2024.

#IGN #Nintendo #WorldOfGoo #WorldOfGoo2

title: Another Crab's Treasure | Nintendo Direct 2024
description:
One crab's trash is another crab's treasure in this underwater Soulslike adventure coming to Nintendo Switch on April 25. Fight against a variety of crustacean bosses using found weapons and umami magic in your hunt for a replacement shell.

#IGN #Nintendo #AnotherCrabsTreasure

title: Rare Nintendo Online Collection Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
description: Rare-developed games Killer Instinct (SNES), Battletoads in Battlemaniacs (SNES), R.C. Pro-Am (NES), and Snake Rattle 'n' Roll (NES) are all coming to Switch Online. Rare’s N64 game Blast Corps launches on the Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack subscription.

title: South Park: Snow Day! - Nintendo Switch Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
description: Join Cartman and friends in this co-op action game set in the town of South Park when it arrives on March 26th, 2024

title: Endless Ocean Luminous - Official Switch Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
description:
The Endless Ocean series returns when it launches on Nintendo Switch on May 2nd, 2024. Journey through the ocean as one of up to 32 players and encounter hundreds of species of sea life on your adventure.

#Nintendo #Gaming #IGN

title: Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble - Official Switch Reveal Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
description:
A brand new Super Monkey Ball game is coming to Nintendo Switch on June 25, 2024. With over 200 new stages, 4-player local co-op, and 16-player online multiplayer, Banana Rumble has plenty of competitive new activities to enjoy.

#Gaming #Nintendo #IGN

title: Star Wars: Battlefront Classic Collection - Nintendo Switch Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
description: Both of the classic Star Wars: Battlefront games come to Nintendo Switch on March 14, featuring 64-player online multiplayer on maps including the Death Star and Naboo.

description:
Check out the complete edition of Shin Megami Tensei V as it makes its way to Nintendo Switch on June 21st, 2024.

title: Ender Magnolia: Bloom in the Mist - Nintendo Switch Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
description: Get a first look at a new gothic action platformer from Binary Haze Interactive.

title: Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed - Nintendo Switch Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
description:
Play as Mickey Mouse in this remake of the 2010 Wii classic. Explore a magical wasteland filled with forgotten characters, and use Mickey's magic brush to reshape the world around you. The game launches on Nintendo Switch in 2024.

#Disney #Nintendo #Gaming

title: Grounded Switch Reveal Trailer | Nintendo Direct 2024
description:
Shrink down to the size of a bug and explore a garden either solo or with friends in Grounded, Obsidian's survival game. Originally available exclusively on Xbox, its coming to Switch on April 16, 2024.

#Grounded #Nintendo #IGN

title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human: Reloaded Edition - Exclusive Trailer
description:
Check out the bloodthirsty Dying Light 2 Reloaded Edition trailer. Dying Light 2 Stay Human: Reloaded Edition features all previous game updates along with the most recent Firearms Update, and the Bloody Ties DLC. Current owners of the Dying Light 2 Standard Edition will get their game upgraded to the Reloaded Edition for free. 

The Dying Light 2 Firearms update is the largest Dying Light 2 update so far, adding guns to the game for the first time. The Reloaded Edition also includes co-op survivor missions, board quests, and several visual enhancements.

Dying Light 2 Stay Human: Reloaded Edition will be available on PS5, PS4, Xbox consoles, and PC. The Dying Light 2 free weekend event runs from February 22-26, 2024 inviting players to try out the Reloaded Edition on PC via Steam.

#DyingLight2 #Gaming #IGN

title: 13 Amazing Updates Coming to Sons of the Forest 1.0
description:
Here are 13 changes coming to the Sons of the Forest 1.0 update on February 22, 2024. From introducing Shawn Ashmore as the voice of Timmy, to finding more clues on the mysterious yet deadly artifact, there are lots of cool new additions coming to the survival horror game in Sons of the Forest version 1.0. We'll also be able to explore an improved open-world Sons of the Forest map, with new locations and people to find, adorable raccoons, and more!

There's a lot to take in now that SotF is leaving Steam Early Access, but with the help of Nathan Srigley, effects technical director at Endnight Games, we've got them covered, alongside showcasing even more exclusive Sons of the Forest 1.0 gameplay.

#SonsOfTheForest #Gaming #IGN
